mapper.sql: exam.id as exam_id, exam.`name` as `exam_name`, exam.address as exam_address, exam.related as exam_related, exam.sexy as exam_sexy
mapper.insert: insert into exam (`name`, address, related, sexy) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{related,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexy,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into exam
`name`,
address,
related,
sexy,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{related,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sexy,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update exam
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
related = #{related,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sexy = #{sexy,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
